name: Suika's Massive Meal
description:
Can this funny little creature beat the eternally hungry Yuyuko in an eating contest? Not by herself, but with the help of the Tiny Suika inside her, anything is possible.

Run around the area, eating tons of food and depriving Yuyuko of a good meal. When Suika is full, switch over to Tiny Suika and destroy the food inside her stomach in a puzzle game like fashion so Regular Suika can eat once more.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  • CONTROLS
    • WASD- move Suika
    • LEFT CLICK- enter attack mode/destroy foods.
    • RIGHT CLICK- Switch between Suikas

CREATED FOR TOUHOU FAN GAME JAM 9

Developed by WOAH_MAAAN

"Ghost Lead" Arrangement by MelonMungus
